column4: WRAPUP 2-U.S. trade deficit widens; weekly jobless claims up modestly
column5: WASHINGTON  Feb 5 The U.S. trade deficit in December widened sharply to its highest level since 2012 as a stronger dollar appeared to suck in imports and weigh on exports  which could see the fourth-quarter economic growth estimate revised lower.
